entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins and a friend of Harry Potter. He is mentioned as looking flabbergasted when Harry offers him the Triwizard winnings.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins and a friend of Harry Potter. He is mentioned as trying to push the sack back at Harry and weighing the money bag in his hands.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and a friend of the Weasley twins. He is mentioned as pulling out his Triwizard winnings and offering them to George.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The Weasley twins are Fred and George, who are friends of Harry Potter. They are mentioned as turning towards Harry when he says 'wait a moment'.

entities.name: joke shop
entities.description: The joke shop is where the Weasley twins plan to use the Triwizard winnings. It is mentioned as being for the joke shop.

relationships.description: Harry offers the Triwizard winnings to George, who is hesitant to take it.
Fred disagrees with Harry's decision to give the Triwizard winnings to George.
